name: TOM: The Last Hope
description:
This is a text based game. Use FullSceen Mode. 

Where in whch you will have to make choices to advance to the next mission. Search for clues hidden in the game.  

Be carefull. Have Fun and enjoy the music. 

Use only numbers to make a choice.

Remember: No player has managed to complete this game in 1 GO.

Hint: Just read everything properly
